title: The Case of the Jingle Bell Jinx
description: Mary-Kate and Ashley are invited to the Winter Wonderland Resort to watch the filming of a holiday TV special. The show features top ice skaters from all over the country, including Mary-Kate and Ashley's two favorite skating sisters. But the show seems jinxed from the start. Props are missing, skaters are injured, and the show is in danger of being cancelled. Even worse, it seems as if the skating sisters are behind it all. Can Mary-Kate and Ashley get the skating spectacular back on ice?
author: Alice Leonhardt
